extendedInfo.description: The lightning fast free NRL live scores app. Get all your NRL updates on the go, including: * Instant score updates with score type and name of scorer. * The latest news, weather forecast, injuries, odds, expert tips, winning streak and tipping trends (from footytips.com.au) for every game. * The NRL ladder and win/loss history for teams. * Enter your tips for Australia's No. 1 tipping site - footytips.com.au. * The latest NRL news from the major news outlets. Bought to you by the team from footytips.com.au, this app is all you need for your NRL fix. We've got all the NRL teams covered, including: Brisbane Broncos, Bulldogs, Canberra Raiders, North Queensland Cowboys, Gold Coast Titans, Manly Sea Eagles, Melbourne Storm, Newcastle Knights, Pernith Panthers, Cronulla Sharks, Rabbitohs, St George Illawarra Dragons, Sydney Roosters, New Zealand Warriers, Wests Tigers, Queensland Maroons and NSW Blues.

reviews.title: Not the same as last year
reviews.comment: Used this app last year & no problems. Im finding that the scores aren\'t updating on the main page bur if you click on the game you can see the score. Also sometimes it doesn\'t load anything. Needs fixing.
reviews.author: NAOMI JACKETT

reviews.title: Bad
reviews.comment: This year 2013 what is happening not giving true score doubling it when I click on game to see stats last year great app

reviews.title: Needs Reminder

reviews.title: Good to have

reviews.title: Unusual permissions
